title: Kandji - Audit
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of Audit logs.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of Audit logs.

For more information, see the [Kandji Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kandji/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Admin Activities by Action over Time
Device Activities by Action over Time
